title: Back to Green

image.alt: Fernwood Mikado Snake Plant in the foreground with a Ponytail Palm in the background.

description: Like many others currently, I’m starting to add plants to my home.

content.content: Inspired by someone close to me, I decided to make a big change in my apartment today — adding some plants. It’s surprising, it took me so long, especially since I had a ton of plants as a kid. My childhood bedroom window sill was practically a mini jungle. It only took a pandemic to help me reconnect with my roots, pun intended.

There is a cute little shop in my neighborhood that sells plants and all kind of gardening stuff. After long hours of indecisiveness, I ended up picking a Fernwood Mikado Snake Plant and a Ponytail Palm.
I’ve already repotted them and can’t wait to see how they grow and write about their progress.

content.alt: Fernwood Mikado Snake Plant in the foreground with a Ponytail Palm in the background.
